shopping.question: How can I browse and find products on Herbify?
shopping.answer: You can explore our diverse range of indoor and outdoor plants by navigating through the categories in the menu, including Indoor Decor, Office Plants, Outdoor Selection, and Decoration Plants.

shopping.question: Can I save my favorite products for later?
shopping.answer: Yes, you can! Simply click on the heart icon next to the product, and it will be added to your wishlist for future reference.

shopping.question: Are the prices on Herbify inclusive of taxes?
shopping.answer: Yes, all prices displayed on Herbify include applicable taxes. You won't encounter any hidden charges during the checkout process.

shopping.question: What if I need assistance while shopping?
shopping.answer: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our customer support team through the` Need Help?` section at the bottom of the page.

payment.question: What payment methods does Herbify accept?
payment.answer: Herbify accepts various payment methods, including major credit cards, debit cards, and secure online payment gateways for a seamless and secure checkout experience.

payment.question: Is my payment information secure on Herbify?
payment.answer: Absolutely. Herbify prioritizes the security of your payment information. All transactions are encrypted, and we do not store any payment details on our servers.

payment.question: Can I modify or cancel my order after payment?
payment.answer: Once an order is placed and payment is processed, it cannot be modified or canceled. Please review your order carefully before confirming your purchase.

payment.question: Are there any additional fees for using a specific payment method?
payment.answer: No, Herbify does not charge any additional fees based on your chosen payment method. The total amount displayed during checkout is the final amount you'll pay.

delivery.question: How is the delivery cost calculated?
delivery.answer: The delivery cost is calculated based on your location and the size of your order. You can view the shipping fees during the checkout process before finalizing your purchase.

delivery.question: What is the estimated delivery time for Herbify orders?
delivery.answer: The estimated delivery time depends on your location. We aim to deliver your order within 4 business days. You can track your order through the provided tracking information.

delivery.question: Can I change my delivery address after placing the order?
delivery.answer: Unfortunately, once the order is confirmed, we cannot modify the delivery address. Please ensure your address is accurate before completing your purchase

delivery.question: What if my product is damaged during delivery?
delivery.answer: In the rare event that your product arrives damaged, please contact our customer support team immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or refund as appropriate.

returnPolicy.question: Can I return a product if I change my mind?
returnPolicy.answer: Yes, Herbify offers a hassle-free return policy. If you change your mind within 14 days of receiving the product, you can initiate a return through your account.

returnPolicy.question: How do I initiate a return on Herbify?
returnPolicy.answer: Log in to your Herbify account, go to the `Order History` section, select the order containing the item you want to return, and follow the provided instructions for initiating a return.

returnPolicy.question: Are there any return shipping fees?
returnPolicy.answer: oIf the return is due to a product defect or an error on our part, Herbify will cover the return shipping fees. For other reasons, return shipping fees may apply.

returnPolicy.question: When can I expect a refund after initiating a return?
returnPolicy.answer: Once we receive the returned item and verify its condition, we will process your refund. Please allow 3 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.
